Package com.nickslibrary.datastructures.trees

Class AVLTree<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.nickslibrary.datastructures.trees.AVLTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of elements stored in the tree.
public class AVLTree<T extends Comparable<T>> extends Object
Implementation of an AVL Tree.

    • findMax

      public AVLTreeNode<T> findMax()
      Finds and returns the node with the maximum value in the AVL tree.
      Returns:
      The AVLTreeNode containing the maximum value, or null if the tree is empty.

      public boolean search(T value)
      Searches for a value in the AVL tree.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to search for.
      Returns:
      True if the value exists in the tree, false otherwise.
